name: capybara
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a South American animal that looks like a large guinea pig, or the meat of this animal that is cooked and eaten: Capybaras are the world's largest rodents, about the size of a medium dog.
EvergreenPlanet/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examples The capybaras, which look like giant guinea pigs, arrived at the zoo in October.The giant rodents known as capybaras are the jaguars' most common prey.Every morning we woke to find ourselves surrounded by fresh tracks made by capybaras (the world's largest species of rodent, looking something like a giant guinea pig).Dried and salted, capybara tastes like a fishy pork chop.A ten-metre anaconda swam underwater to ambush a baby capybara.
